mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(NV_NO,-4)),0)+1 AS NV_NO FROM NON_VIDEO

SELECT NV_NO, NV_TITLE, NV_VIDEO, TO_CHAR(A.NV_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') NV_INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.NV_UPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') NV_UPDATEDATE, NV_DELETEYN, TT_NO, NV_VIEWS, NV_LIKES FROM NON_VIDEO A WHERE NV_NO=#{nvNo}

SELECT NV_NO, NV_TITLE, NV_VIDEO, TO_CHAR(A.NV_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') NV_INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(A.NV_UPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') NV_UPDATEDATE, NV_DELETEYN, TT_NO, NV_VIEWS, NV_LIKES FROM NON_VIDEO A WHERE NV_DELETEYN='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NON_VIDEO( NV_NO, NV_TITLE, NV_VIDEO, NV_INSERTDATE, NV_UPDATEDATE, NV_DELETEYN, TT_NO, NV_VIEWS, NV_LIKES) VALUES( #{nvNo}, #{nvTitle}, #{nvVideo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{ttNo}, 0, 0)
